languages.text: {n}Сенешаль ежится.{/n} "Чудовище из кошмара, столь жуткое, что мой разум отказывается удерживать в себе его образ. Мясо, металл и много игл... Оно меня ело. Саму мою душу! И съело бы целиком, если бы не насытилось прежде другой своей добычей".

{n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль ежится.{/n} "Чудовище из кошмара, столь жуткое, что мой разум отказывается удерживать в себе его образ. Мясо, металл и много игл... Оно меня ело. Саму мою душу! И съело бы целиком, если бы не насытилось прежде другой своей добычей".

traits.locale_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly that my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another prey before me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は身震いする。{/n}「あまりにおぞましい悪夢だったせいか…私の心はその様子をはっきりと思い浮かべることを拒んでいます。肉と金属と、たくさんの針しか思い出せない…それは私を貪りました。私の魂そのものを食べたんです！私の前に別の者を食べていなければ、私を丸ごと食い尽くしていたでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は身震いする。{/n}「あまりにおぞましい悪夢だったせいか…私の心はその様子をはっきりと思い浮かべることを拒んでいます。肉と金属と、たくさんの針しか思い出せない…それは私を貪りました。私の魂そのものを食べたんです！私の前に別の者を食べていなければ、私を丸ごと食い尽くしていたでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}他浑身发抖。{/n}“是噩梦的怪物，它实在是太可怕了，我的头脑不肯描绘清晰的形象。除了血肉和金属之外，它还带着很多很多针头……它在我身上大快朵颐，尽情享受我的灵魂！要不是因为已经吃过了别的猎物，它肯定会把我整个吞下去。”
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他浑身发抖。{/n}“是噩梦的怪物，它实在是太可怕了，我的头脑不肯描绘清晰的形象。除了血肉和金属之外，它还带着很多很多针头……它在我身上大快朵颐，尽情享受我的灵魂！要不是因为它在吃我之前，先吃了别的猎物，它肯定会把我整个吞下去。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Se estremece.{/n} «Un engendro horrible, tan espantoso que mi mente se niega a volver a pensar en él. No era más que carne, metal y muchas, muchas agujas... Se dio un festín conmigo. ¡Se dio un festín con mi alma! Me habría devorado entero si no se hubiera atiborrado de otro antes».
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se estremece.{/n} «Un engendro horrible, tan espantoso que mi mente se niega a volver a pensar en él. No era más que carne, metal y muchas, muchas agujas... Se dio un festín conmigo. ¡Se dio un festín con mi alma! Me habría devorado entero si no se hubiera atiborrado de otra presa antes».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Er schaudert.{/n} "Eine Ausgeburt von Albträumen, so grauenhaft, dass mein Verstand sich weigert, mir ein klares Bild davon zu zeigen. Nichts als Fleisch, Metall und viele, viele Nadeln ... Es hat sich an mir gelabt. Hat sich an meiner Seele gelabt! Es hätte mich vollständig verschlungen, hätte es sich nicht vor mir schon an anderen sattgegessen."
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er schaudert.{/n} "Eine Ausgeburt von Albträumen, so grauenhaft, dass mein Verstand sich weigert, mir ein klares Bild davon zu zeigen. Nichts als Fleisch, Metall und viele, viele Nadeln ... Es hat sich an mir gelabt. Hat sich an meiner Seele gelabt! Es hätte mich vollständig verschlungen, hätte es sich nicht vor mir schon an anderer Beute vollgefressen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Il frémit.{/n} « Une créature cauchemardesque, si abominable que mon esprit refuse de se la représenter. Ce n'était qu'un amas de viande, de métal et d'aiguilles... Tant d'aiguilles... Il s'est nourri de moi. De mon âme ! Et il m'aurait dévoré tout entier s'il n'était pas déjà à moitié repu. »
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il frémit.{/n} « Une créature cauchemardesque, si abominable que mon esprit refuse de se la représenter. Ce n'était qu'un amas de viande, de métal et d'aiguilles... Tant d'aiguilles... Il s'est nourri de moi. De mon âme ! Et il m'aurait dévoré tout entier s'il n'était pas déjà à moitié repu. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard ürperiyor.{/n} "Kâbuslardan fırlamış bir yaratık. Öylesine korkunçtu ki aklım, net bir şekilde görmeme engel oldu. Sırf et, metal ve çok ama çok fazla iğneden oluşuyordu... Benimle, hatta bizzat ruhumla kendine ziyafet çekti! Benden önce bir başkasıyla karnını tıka basa doyurmuş olmasaydı beni de bir çırpıda yiyip yutabilirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}He shudders.{/n} "A spawn of nightmares, so ghastly, my mind refuses to picture a clear image of it. Nothing but meat, metal, and many, many needles... It feasted on me. Feasted on my very soul! It would have devoured me whole if it hadn't gorged itself on another before me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard ürperiyor.{/n} "Kâbuslardan fırlamış bir yaratık. Öylesine korkunçtu ki, aklım net bir şekilde görmeme engel oldu. Sırf et, metal ve çok ama çok fazla iğneden oluşuyordu... Benimle kendine ziyafet çekti, hatta bizzat ruhumla! Benden önce bir başkasıyla karnını tıka basa doyurmuş olmasaydı, beni de bir çırpıda yiyip yutabilirdi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
